short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly and easily clear your browser cache, browsing history, form data and more with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy Browser Cleaner is a simple and easy to use web browser extension for Chrome, designed to simplify the process of cleaning your browser. With a single click, you can effortlessly clean your browser cache, browsing history, form data, and much more!

This will enhance your browsing experience by maintaining privacy and improving browser performance.

You can do the following in Easy Browser Cleaner:
- Clear Chrome Browser Cache
- Clear Chrome Brower Form Data
- Clear Chrome Browser History
- Clear Chrome Browser Passwords
- Clear Chrome Browser Cookies

Cleaning Chrome cache and browser history could never be more simple, so why not give our lightweight cleaning tool extension a try.

****Please be aware that once you use one of the cleaning options within the extension, you will not be able to reverse it****
